name.ja: ダイスマイトガール・ラップス

requirement.en: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en:
Roll a six-sided die twice and apply the appropriate effect based on the total result.
● 7 or 11: Place 1 card from your opponent's field on the bottom of the owner's Deck.
● 2, 3, or 12: Change the battle position of 1 monster on your field.
● Other: This card gains ATK equal to [the total result] x 200 until the end of your opponent's next turn.
